attributes.action: Make it harder for British busnesses to be targets of hostile take over by overseas buyers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The time has come (no, it is long overdue) for the British Government to make it much harder for there to be a hostile takeover bid for British companies such as Cadbury's by overseas companies.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
